prompt:
A highly alluring Korean woman in her 20s sitting on tatami near open doors to the ocean,
golden hour, high-angle shot from above.
Pose: legs folded to one side, hips angled, one hand gripping the floor lightly; she looks up
with a calm but commanding gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: soft cotton lounge set (matte), visible fabric wrinkles.
Lighting: warm side light + bounce fill, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 50mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 160/400, subtle grain.
Exclusions: no text/logos; realistic pores; avoid perfect symmetry; no HDR/no sharpening
halos.
